body_html: A side-effect of this is that if you make a mistake during "./configure" step, you must start over in a new directory. IE, running configure to change capability to "3.0" after setting it to default at first, doesn't have the desired effect, and "bazel clean" doesn't work because of this error

body: A side-effect of this is that if you make a mistake during "./configure" step, you must start over in a new directory. IE, running configure to change capability to "3.0" after setting it to default at first, doesn't have the desired effect, and "bazel clean" doesn't work because of this error
